title: Help
maintext:

Curabitur a diam in lacus commodo vehicula. In hac habitasse platea dictumst. In hac habitasse platea dictumst. Donec laoreet diam id odio luctus iaculis feugiat orci ullamcorper. Aenean justo mi, aliquam et bibendum euismod, malesuada a ante. Mauris turpis dolor, tincidunt nec sagittis eu, suscipit in massa. Nunc sapien mi, volutpat ut ornare vitae, tincidunt ut felis. Praesent dapibus rutrum mauris eu rhoncus. Cras accumsan sagittis orci ut imperdiet. In ut mollis justo. Mauris facilisis orci et diam posuere vulputate. Cum sociis natoque penatibus et magnis dis parturient montes, nascetur ridiculus mus. Sed elementum sodales consequat. Integer porttitor, erat a ultricies aliquet, metus est luctus purus, non rhoncus diam sapien quis tortor.

Nam pharetra placerat magna, nec interdum lectus pharetra vel. Aliquam erat volutpat. Praesent nisl elit, luctus non gravida vitae, sodales eu arcu. table:
QueryFind documents
oorlog vredeContaining both "oorlog" and "vrede". AND is the default operator.
oorlog OR vredeContaining "oorlog" or "vrede".
oorlog +vredeThat must contain "vrede", and may contain oorlog.
oorlog -vredeContaining "oorlog", but not "vrede"
(oorlog OR vrede) AND iranGrouping is supported as well. Finds documents that contain either "oorlog" or "vrede", in combination with "iran".
"oorlog en vrede"Containing the exact phrase "oorlog en vrede".
"oorlog vrede"~3Search for the terms "oorlog" and "vrede" occuring within 3 words of eachother in a document.
oorlog^4 vredeThe relevance of a document is determined based on terms found in that document. Using the "^"-symbol enables the user to boost the importance of a term with a factor, and thereby influence the scoring algorithm. In this example, "oorlog" is considered 4 times as important as "vrede"
"vast en zeker"^4 "zeker en vast"Phrase queries can be boosted as well. The phrase "vast en zeker" is considered more important in scoring than "zeker en vast".
te?tPerform a single character wildcard search. Matches on terms with the single charachter replaced, such as "test" or "tent". Prefix wildcards are supported.
oorl*Performs a multiple character wildcard search. Finds documents containing terms with the prefix "oorl". Matches on "oorlog", but also on "oorlogsjaar".
*rlogPerforms a multiple character wildcard search. Finds documents containing terms with the suffix "rlog". Matches on "oorlog", but also on "grondoorlog".
maximum~Performs a fuzzy search using the Levenshtein (edit distance) algorithm. Matches up to 50 terms, ranked on how many characters in the query have to be replaced. Matches "maximum", and "MÃ¡xima".
maximum~0.8The "fuzziness" of a fuzzy query can be controlled by an optional parameter. The parameter has a value between 0 and 1 with a value closer to 1 only terms with a higher similarity will be matched. The default value is 0.5.
